# Reference Documentation

Lookup tables and specifications â€” not for learning, for finding.

## How to Use This Section

This section is for **lookup**, not **learning**. Use it when you need:
- Exact function signatures
- Complete type definitions
- All configuration options
- CLI command syntax

For understanding, see [Concepts](../concepts/index.md).

## Reference Documents

| Document | Contents |
|----------|----------|
| [API](api.md) | Function signatures and usage |
| [Types](types.md) | Complete type definitions |
| [Configuration](configuration.md) | All configuration options |
| [CLI](cli.md) | Command-line interface |
| [Performance](performance.md) | Limits, sampling, and memory |
| [Glossary](glossary.md) | Terminology |

## Stability Guarantees

| Component | Stability |
|-----------|-----------|
| `infer()` | Stable |
| `apply_answers()` | Stable |
| `InferenceResult` | Stable |
| `InvariantProposal` | Stable |
| `DecisionRecord` | Stable |
| Internal modules | May change |
